pr_title: Update microprofile examples to use microprofile-config.properties

timeline.message: Update microprofile examples to use microprofile-config.properties
Add back int list. Checkstyle fix.

timeline.bodyText: Haven't looked deeply but down below you set the port to 7001, so will a dynamic port truly be used?
timeline.author: ljnelson
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -13,5 +13,8 @@ Then try the endpoints:
 
 ```
 curl -X GET http://localhost:7001/helloworld
-curl -X GET http://localhost:7001/helloworld/another
+curl -X GET http://localhost:7001/helloworld/earth
 ```
+
+By default the server will use a dynamic port, see the messages displayed
+when the application starts.

replies.bodyText: In the explicit example it uses a dynamic port. In the implicit example it uses 7001.
replies.author: barchetta
